description: Celtic druids were not only very influential, but also sacrosanct and greatly feared; they often stayed on the battlefield during the actual fighting. It was believed killing a druid would bring eternal misfortune on you and your descendants, for all generations to come.
tooltip: Healers have +20% walk speed, +4 hack, pierce, and crush armour levels, but also +100% training time, and +50 metal and wood costs.
